audioFiles.speaker: Dev A
audioFiles.text: This is a test of the voice reuse feature.

audioFiles.speaker: Dev B
audioFiles.text: We want to make sure that each character uses the same voice throughout the dialogue.

audioFiles.speaker: Dev A
audioFiles.text: I should sound the same in this line as I did in my first line.

audioFiles.speaker: Dev B
audioFiles.text: And I should maintain my voice characteristics too.
